snippet: President Obama should sign an executive order to raise the pay of millions of poorly paid employees of government contractors.
abstract: Editorial calls on Pres Obama to fight widening income inequality by issuing an executive order to raise wages for poorly paid employees of government contracts; cites studies finding hundreds of billions in federal funding currently flows to companies that pay low wages and provide few if any benefits.
lead_paragraph: President Obama should sign an executive order to raise the pay of millions of poorly paid employees of government contractors.

headline.main: The Government as a Low-Wage Employer
headline.print_headline: The Government as a Low-Wage Employer
